verbose_text: Here, we utilized a STR reference-free method called Expansion Hunter De Novo (EHdn), in combination with multiple reference based tools, to show that CANVAS is caused by the homozygous inheritance of a previously undescribed expanded intronic pentamer [(AAGGG) exp] in the gene encoding Replication Factor C Subunit 1 (RFC1).
evidence: CANVAS is caused by the homozygous inheritance of a previously undescribed expanded intronic pentamer [(AAGGG) exp ] in the gene encoding Replication Factor C Subunit 1
